## Course Aims

1. To familiarise with the good practices of data visualization.

2. To introduce the distinction between explorative and insightful data visualization.

3. To teach the use of R package ggplot for data visualization. 

 

## Objectives

At the end of the course the students should be able to choose the right visualization, scale and color palette to visualise simple to complex multidimentional data. They should be further able to produce simple plots using ggplot.
